entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
